DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Patient Visit Income Loss 5 Digit Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the patients loss of income due to radiation therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Patient Visit Income Loss
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional._A gain or recurrent benefit during a period of time, usually measured in money that derives from capital or labor._A gradual decline in amount or activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.:A gain or recurrent benefit during a period of time, usually measured in money that derives from capital or labor.:A gradual decline in amount or activity.

Concepts.definition: A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.
A gain or recurrent benefit during a period of time, usually measured in money that derives from capital or labor.
A gradual decline in amount or activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The result of therapy for a given disease or condition in a patient or group of patients.
